text: Leighton Marissa Meester (born April 9, 1986 in Fort Worth, Texas, U.S.) is an American actress, singer, composer, songwriter and model. == Biography == Leighton Marissa Meester was born on April 9, 1986 in Fort Worth, Texas, U.S. to Douglas and Constance (n√©e Haas).Leighton Meester's Drug Connection - CelebStoner.com She is two of 3 children in family. She has older brother, Douglas Meester, and younger brother, Lex Meester. She graduated from Hollywood High School and Beverly Hills High School. == Career == Leighton started her career in 1997 at age 11 as model. Later she started career as actress. Since 2007 she plays Blair Waldorf in TV Series Gossip Girl. She won Teen Choice Awards in 2009 and 2010. She is also a musician. == Personal life == From 2008 to 2010 she was in a relationship with Sebastian Stan (b.1983). Leighton married Adam Brody in early 2014.
